::FireBlade::
FireBlade ran in the way that Rattrap was firing 15 Powersurge shots
and his SGL fired three liquid fire grenades in a to three vertices of
a trianle centering Ratrap in the middle of it....

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Autofire::
>
> Autofire ducks to the side, but FireBlade takes the blasts for him
> anyways. He jumps up, transforming into vehicle mode.
>
> "Thanks," he says to FireBlade before flying toward Starwind, firing
> two missiles at him.
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > ::FireBlade::
> > FireBlade saw Autofire being attacked and ran to protect him. He
> dove
> > in front of Autofire taking the laser shots from starwind in the lag
> > not doing much damage. While going throught the air he shot three
> > grenades from his SGL at the incoming shell with them exploding by
> it
> > and the liquid fire burning the shell to nothing.
